data.name: The Silver Case
data.detailed_description:
The Silver Case: The Deluxe Pack


The Silver Case: The Deluxe Pack

  • Game
  • Artbook
Original and revised artworks drawn by Takashi Miyamoto combined into one exclusive artbook!
  • Comic
The hidden story between Moonlight Syndrome and The Silver Case, "Pre-Lunatics".
  • OST
Total 34 BGMs from the game including the OP remix.


About the Game


1999 - the "24 Wards". A string of mysterious serial killings plagues the city.
The detectives of the 24 Wards Heinous Crimes Unit have their eyes on one man: Kamui Uehara, legendary serial killer and assassin of a number of government officials 20 years prior in the now-famous "Silver Case". However, nobody knows who - or what - Kamui really is.

Has he really returned? Who is this infamous serial killer?

As player, you will take control of the protagonist - a member of the Special Forces Unit known as “Republic” - from a first-person perspective. Inspired by classic adventure and visual novel-style games, The Silver Case offers a fresh and unique gameplay experience as it leads the player through an in-depth story containing various puzzles, uncovering the truth piece by piece.


Kamui Uehara

After stabbing a government official, he gained the title of “King of Crime” His motive is still unknown or whether a contractor actually exists or not. The victims are major witnesses in cases of human-caused disasters and cases which cannot be properly judged under the present legal and constitutional structure.

Sumio Kodai

Faithfully preforms his duty as a mid-level investigator in the 24 Wards Heinous Crimes Unit.

クサビ テツゴロウ

A veteran investigator partnered with Sumio. As a regional agent he headed the Silver Case 20 years ago.

Chizuru Hachisuka

Carries out her crime investigations based on scientific evidence and data. She’s level-headed and beautiful.

Kiyoshi Morikawa

A companion of Kusabi since the days they worked together as regional agents. He’s a veteran belonging to the Heinous Crimes Unit since its establishment. Calm and collected, he is an efficient and talented agent.

Morichika Nakategawa

He used to work in the public sector and has connections in each and every area; therefore he can ensure communications with neighboring parties got smoothly. He focuses more on investigating from the police department than searching for clues at the scene of the crime.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP SP2+ or newer
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support or greater
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX9 (shader model 3.0) or greater
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 7 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.8 or later
  • Processor: 1.4GHz dual-core Intel Core i5 or greater
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 5000 or greater
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
